location: The frontiers of Mantua. The forest.

lines.speaker: first outlaw
lines.text: Come, come, Be patient; we must bring you to our captain.

lines.speaker: silvia
lines.text: A thousand more mischances than this one Have learn'd me how to brook this patiently.

lines.speaker: first outlaw
lines.text: Where is the gentleman that was with her?

lines.speaker: third outlaw
lines.text: Being nimble-footed, he hath outrun us, But Moyses and Valerius follow him. Go thou with her to the west end of the wood; There is our captain: we'll follow him that's fled; The thicket is beset; he cannot 'scape.

lines.speaker: first outlaw
lines.text: Come, I must bring you to our captain's cave: Fear not; he bears an honourable mind, And will not use a woman lawlessly.

lines.speaker: silvia
lines.text: O Valentine, this I endure for thee!
